TEXT.TITLE: GERMAN NET CURRENCY RESERVES RISE
TEXT.BODY: West German net currency reserves rose by 300 mln marks in the third week of March to 82.0 billion, following a fall of 5.4 billion marks in the previous week, the Bundesbank said. Non-currency reserves were unchanged at about 2.5 billion marks, bringing net monetary reserves to 84.5 billion. REUTER
